channel.title: flatpak on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in flatpak on Dan Aukes

item.title: Preparation
item.description: First, update apt sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y Install Flatpak # install sudo apt install flatpak -y #if you want to install from software GUI sudo apt install gnome-software-plugin-flatpak -y #add the flathub repo flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.

item.title: Multiple Clocks in Ubuntu / Gnome
item.description: sudo apt install gnome-clocks flatpak install com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager flatpak run com.mattjakeman.ExtensionManager click browse tab search for “world clock” and select “panel world clock”

item.title: quick scripts for openscad
item.description: color("red",1) import("path/to/your-part.stl"); flatpak run org.openscad.OpenSCAD -o test.png --projection orthogonal test.scad with camera orientation but no scaling
